experiences.title: System Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Matter Motors Pvt. Ltd.
workDescription: Implemented OS flashing for the VIC system via OTA updates and ADB commands, ensuring seamless functionality and software stability.

Defined and documented key features for the Companion App, including Geofencing, Remote Lock/Unlock, and Buzzer capabilities, enhancing user experience and security while ensuring compliance with legal and system requirements.
Developed and executed 300+ test cases for the VIC ecosystem, improving product stability through rigorous testing with Busmaster and P-CAN.
